sentences.english: Although solitary accessory spleen is not uncommon, multiple accessory spleens are rare.
sentences.chinese: 虽然单一性副脾并非不常见，但多发性副脾仍属少见。

sentences.english: Although it is not expensive, we never seem to have quite enough money.
sentences.chinese: 虽然这是不昂贵的，我们从来没有，似乎已很够了钱。

sentences.english: E-Gold used for now BUT their own payment processor soon!
sentences.chinese: 虽然现在用eg，但是马上就推出自己的网银。

sentences.english: Although he passed away, he was able to experience his greatest wish.
sentences.chinese: 虽然他去世了，但他终能实现他最大的愿望。

sentences.english: Strike was over, but problem existed stilly .
sentences.chinese: 罢工虽然解决了，但问题依然存在。

sentences.english: Gardens in Japan, though of Chinese parentage, have more conventions and less complexity in lay-out than the Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 日本园林，虽然源于中国，布局的习俗化大于复杂化。

sentences.english: Be passionate about your work although toady is Monday.
sentences.chinese: 虽然今天是星期一，但是保持你的工作热情。

sentences.english: Though she meant well, she was often chastised for being the teacher's pet.
sentences.chinese: 虽然她是好意，可她因为是老师的宠儿而常被惩罚。

sentences.english: AlthoughI walked slowly, I got hot and sweaty.
sentences.chinese: 虽然我走得慢，但是我还是热出了一身汗。

sentences.english: Althogh I tried to pursuade him to stop smoking, he still could not make his mind.
sentences.chinese: 虽然我尽力劝他别抽烟了，他还是下不了决心。

sentences.english: But they are willing to teach even though they're not getting paid what they should get paid.
sentences.chinese: 他们还是愿意去教，虽然他们并没得到应得的报酬。

sentences.english: This image is stark in its brutality but was the reality of the time.
sentences.chinese: 这张照片虽然很残忍，但是当时的真实写照。

sentences.english: These lunches, though, are where the pampering begins and ends.
sentences.chinese: 这些午餐，虽然，是纵容开始和结束的地方。

sentences.english: Chronics as the process is, the kidney failure may occur rapidly.
sentences.chinese: 虽然这一过程是慢性的，但肾衰竭也可能迅速出现。

sentences.english: Although issuer gets right gold, need to assume the market to turn over aweather danger however.
sentences.chinese: 发行者虽然收到权利金，却需要承担市场反向风险。

sentences.english: Toyota has made it clear that although it was paying the fine, it was not admitting to any wrongdoing.
sentences.chinese: 丰田虽然已缴款，但拒不承认有过失。

definition: despite/although/even though/in spite of/unhesitatingly/do not hesitate (to ask, complain etc)/(go ahead and do it) without hesitating
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
but/yet/however/while/to go back/to decline/to retreat/nevertheless/even though
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
